data.title: Ivy Tech Community College
data.text:
Welcome To Peru

Ivy Tech Peru is part of the Ivy Tech Kokomo full-service campus. Ivy Tech Peru offers classrooms and lab facilities where students can take in-person classes for a variety of academic programs. Currently, courses offered via Peru location focus on health sciences requirements.

Search Upcoming Classes

Kokomo: Your Nearest Full-Service Campus

Complete student services–such as admissions, financial aid, advising, bookstore, library, tutoring, and more–can be accessed via the Kokomo campus, located just 20 miles from Ivy Tech Peru. Full-service campuses like Kokomo have all the services, resources, and classes you need during your time as an Ivy Tech student.
